**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Dewey Daystar](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1938) **Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 46 **Perception** +10; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Druidic](/Languages.aspx?ID=23), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294) (succulents only) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Alkenstar Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +8, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8 **Str** +0 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** +1 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +4 **Items** _wand of [heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)_ (1st) --- **AC** 16 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +6 **Will** +10 **HP** 40 **Spiny Body** A cactus leshy is covered in spines. A creature that [Grabs](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) the cactus leshy takes 1d8+3 piercing damage.
**Verdant Burst** When Dewey Daystar dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from his body, restoring 2d8 Hit Points to each [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125) creature in a 30-foot emanation. This area fills with cacti, becoming difficult terrain. If the terrain is not a viable environment for the cacti, they wither after 24 hours. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** spine +8 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d8+3 piercing **Ranged** spine +8 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d6+3 piercing **Primal Spells** DC 18, attack +10 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330) - **1st** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154), [Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179)
name: Dewey Daystar

A creature that Grabs the cactus leshy takes 1d8+3 piercing damage. Verdant Burst When Dewey Daystar dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from his body, restoring 2d8 Hit Points to each plant creature in a 30-foot emanation. This area fills with cacti, becoming difficult terrain. If the terrain is not a viable environment for the cacti, they wither after 24 hours. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action spine +8 (Finesse, Unarmed), Damage 1d8+3 piercing Ranged Single Action spine +8 (range increment 20 feet, Unarmed), Damage 1d6+3 piercing Primal Spells DC 18, attack +10 - Cantrips (1st) Acid Splash, Dancing Lights, Guidance, Stabilize, Tanglefoot - 1st Heal, Hydraulic Push, Magic Fang
